answers.answer: First off, it's common to fail the 1 hour but pass the 3 hour,  so i wouldn't worryI failed my first test but passed the 3 hour oneif you fail the 3 hour test, you will see a nutritionist and be put on a diet. If you can't control your sugar level with diet, you will be put on insulin.

I horribly failed my 1 hour AND my 3 hour (96/210/234/129). I was sent to a diabetes educator. I take my blood sugar 4 times a day. Doctor checked all the data I had collected over two weeks of diet restrictions to see if I need meds or insulin. I'm doing great after 4 weeks of just watching what I eat. GD ***** but once you give birth it goes away.

Thank you @deltagreen yea she said my one hour was extremely high and I didn't even eat anything. Had me a little freaked out I've never been a person not even while pregnant to eat junk and surgary stuff ;(
I failed my one hour so bad my doctor told me I would never pass my three hour. So now I check my blood sugar levels four times a day. If I can't keep them under control I will have to use insulin.
Dang. Yea mine was very high doing 3hr test on Monday and I'm a little worried :/

I failed my first one hr and had to do the three hour and I passed I hated it though I had bad morning sickness and I hate cola and wanted to throw up and had to hold it for three hours!!!!... I know we get tested again at 28-30 weeks and I am not looking forward to it

question: So I've seen a few post about this but never read them ( wish I had) I just failed mine and Dr said sugar was way way high.. So now what's after the 3hr test if I fail that. ? What should I expect? Any advice? Any one else going through this?   :(
title: Help..1hr glucose fail.
